2.label: CO2 reporting threshold
2.description: 0 report disabled, base on 5ppm unit, 10 by default, 10*5ppm=50ppm

3.label: Temperature reporting threshold
3.description: 0 report disabled, base on 0.5C unit, 1 by default, 1*0.5C=0.5C

4.label: Humidity reporting threshold
4.description: 0 report disabled, base on 1% unit, 2 by default, 2*1C=2C

255.label: Factory setting
255.description: Restore the factory setting - write only, set to 85 to reset
